attributes.action: Discuss the future of democratic elections after ignoring campaign rule breach.
attributes.background: The Electoral Commission have ruled that the leave campaign broke electoral rules, however Parliament continues to base their Brexit mandate on this 2016 referendum. Why is Parliament choosing to ignore this breach and what precedent are they setting for the future of democratic elections?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions on this subject. You might like to sign one of these if it calls for something you'd like to happen. You're more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241848

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245297
